item.description:
Forro band, JATIR & BANDA - Só Pra Forrozear! will be playing tonight.

***********************
This event starts and ends a little early. The party starts at 8pm and ends officially at 12noon. However there is usually an after party that follows downstairs.

I suspect that there may be a dance lesson before the event. I will update the event as I learn any news.

************************

The cover at the door is $15 and $10 if tickets are purchased in advance.
There are phone numbers listed on the image if you like call about advance purchasing.
******************************************************

There is a few of us in the group that are taking Forro dance classes, and this would be a great opportunity for us to practice what we have learned.

And for those who want to practicePortuguese, the majority attending these events are native speakers, so this would be a good opportunity for you to speak and also have fun.

For those who do not know Forro, it is a really fun music/dance from the northeast of Brazil.

Wear comfortable dancing shoes.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Forró at Benfica
